## 20224 Continuous Assessment\

```{r include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(grid)
library(DT)

# Read data from specific sheet in excel
data1 <- read_excel("CM_20224.xlsx", sheet = "MAT112_KAC1101C")
data2 <- read_excel("CM_20224.xlsx", sheet = "MAT112_KAC1101D")
data3 <- read_excel("CM_20224.xlsx", sheet = "MAT112_KAM1101G")
data4 <- read_excel("CM_20224.xlsx", sheet = "MAT402_KAM2281A")
data5 <- read_excel("CM_20224.xlsx", sheet = "MAT402_KAM2281B")

# Omit columns 3 to 5
data1_new <- data1[, -c(3:5)]
data2_new <- data2[, -c(3:5)]
data3_new <- data3[, -c(3:5)]
data4_new <- data4[, -c(3:5)]
data5_new <- data5[, -c(3:5)]

# Format the last column to display only 2 decimal places
data1_new[,ncol(data1_new)] <- round(data1_new[,ncol(data1_new)], 2)
data2_new[,ncol(data2_new)] <- round(data2_new[,ncol(data2_new)], 2)
data3_new[,ncol(data3_new)] <- round(data3_new[,ncol(data3_new)], 2)
data4_new[,ncol(data4_new)] <- round(data4_new[,ncol(data4_new)], 2)
data5_new[,ncol(data5_new)] <- round(data5_new[,ncol(data5_new)], 2)
```

## 20232 Continuous Assessment\

```{r include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(grid)
library(DT)

# Read data from specific sheet in excel
data6 <- read_excel("CM_20232.xlsx", sheet = "MAT402_KAM2282A")
data7 <- read_excel("CM_20232.xlsx", sheet = "MAT402_KAM2282B")

# Omit columns 3 to 5
data6_new <- data6[, -c(3:5)]
data7_new <- data7[, -c(3:5)]

# Format the last column to display only 2 decimal places
data6_new[,ncol(data6_new)] <- round(data6_new[,ncol(data6_new)], 2)
data7_new[,ncol(data7_new)] <- round(data7_new[,ncol(data7_new)], 2)
```
